<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Config </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>



</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns base entry of config entry.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''inheritsFrom''' config </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value>  config: [[Config]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Config]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_base = [[inheritsFrom]] ([[configFile]] [[gtgt|>>]] "CfgVehicles" [[gtgt|>>]] "Car");</code> Result is [[Config]] entry for class "LandVehicle" </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> Print parent tree of given config class:<code>fnc_printParents =
{
	[[disableSerialization]];
	[[if]] (![[isClass]] _this) [[exitWith]] {[[hint]] "Argument is not a config Class"};
	
	[[private]] _parents = [];
	
	[[while]] {![[isNull]] _this} [[do]]
	{
		_parents [[pushBack]] [[configName]] _this;  
		_this = [[inheritsFrom]] _this;
	};
	
	[[reverse]] _parents;
	
	[[private]] _tv = [[findDisplay]] 46 [[createDisplay]] "RscDisplayEmpty" [[ctrlCreate]] ["RscTree", -1];
	_tv [[ctrlSetPosition]] [0,0,1,1];
	_tv [[ctrlSetBackgroundColor]] [0,0,0,0.5];
	_tv [[ctrlCommit]] 0;
	
	[[private]] _path = [];
	{
		_tv [[tvAdd]] [_path, _x];
		_path [[pushBack]] 0;
	} 
	[[forEach]] _parents;
	
	[[tvExpandAll]] _tv;
};

// Example:
([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> [[typeOf]] [[player]]) [[call]] fnc_printParents;</code>
[[Image:inheritsFrom.jpg|left|300px]] </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[configFile]], [[config/name]], [[configName]], [[count]], [[getArray]], [[getText]], [[getNumber]], [[isArray]], [[isClass]], [[isNumber]], [[isText]], [[select]], [[configHierarchy]], [[isKindOf]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on Apr 2, 2014 - 17:11
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]<dd class="note">
(A3 1.14)Use [[BIS_fnc_returnParents]] if a parents' collection of the given entry is needed.
<code>
[([[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "Land_Atm_02_F"),[[true]] ] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_returnParents]];
//return: ["Land_Atm_02_F","House_Small_F","House_F","House","HouseBase","NonStrategic","Building","Static","All"]
</code>
Not all entries have parent, and please differ parents from path.
<code>
[[inheritsFrom]] ([[configFile]] >> "CfgUIColors" >> "IGUI" >> "Presets" >> "PresetA1" >> "Variables");
//return: Nothing
</code>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
